name: Eleclaw
effect:
[Main] You may rest 1 of your cards: If your Leader has the {Minks} type, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −3 cost during this turn.
[Counter] Up to 1 of your {Minks} type Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: Shark Brick Fist
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your {Fish-Man} type Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this battle. Then, set up to 1 of your {Fish-Man} type Characters as active.
trigger: [Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

name: Ice Time
effect: [Main] You may trash 1 card from your hand: If your Leader has the {Navy} type, up to 2 of your opponent's Characters with 10000 power or less cannot attack until the end of your opponent's next End Phase.
trigger: [Trigger] Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 5 or less to the owner's hand.

name: I Heard the Sound...of a Lady's Teardrops Falling
effect:
[Main] If your Leader is [Sanji], look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 [Sanji] or Event card and add it to your hand. Then, trash the rest.
[Counter] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Up to 1 of your [Sanji] cards gains +4000 power during this battle.

name: Flame Dragon Torch
effect:
[Main] You may rest 6 of your DON!! cards: Up to 1 of your [Kaido] cards gains +3000 power during this turn. Then, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters.
[Counter] DON!! −1: Your Leader gains +4000 power during this battle.

name: Stealth Black
effect: [Main] If your Leader is [Sanji] and you have 4 or more DON!! cards on your field, play up to 1 [Sanji] with 6000 power or less from your hand or trash.
trigger: [Trigger] Draw 2 cards and trash 1 card from your hand.
